participant_1.name: Oliver Smith
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, with a strong focus on career advancement. Enjoys luxury and values education highly.
participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

participant_2.name: Jasmine Walker
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and adventurous, with a quirky sense of humor. Enjoys gaming and unique hobbies.
participant_2.background: i play a lot of call of duty. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i like donuts. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.
